research_group.name: Computer Vision in Medicine
research_group.description: In our group "Computer Vision in Medicine", we tackle a variety of problems relating to the automated analysis of visual information in the clinical setting. This ranges across different fields of medical imaging from PET-CT scans over radiological data to photo-based imaging. We investigate ways how we can provide essential information to medical staff in the most efficient manner to streamline the clinical workflow.

leader.name: Dr. Constantin Seibold
leader.bio: Machine Learning Researcher specializing in Computer Vision applications in medical imaging.

research_areas.description: Automated analysis of medical imaging data including CT, MRI, and X-ray images.
Development of AI systems to assist radiologists and medical professionals.
Integration of imaging data with clinical reports and patient information.
Creating interpretable AI systems for medical decision-making.
